snippet: Synergy Pharmaceuticals said its drug to treat idiopathic constipation met the main goal in a late-stage trial, sending its shares up as much as 67 percent to a four-year high.
lead_paragraph: Synergy Pharmaceuticals said its drug to treat idiopathic constipation met the main goal in a late-stage trial, sending its shares up as much as 67 percent to a four-year high.

headline.main: Constipation Drug Succeeds in Late-Stage Trial
headline.print_headline: Constipation Drug Succeeds In Late-Stage Trial
